title.default:
ON SALE for 2022 11·11 Shopping Festival
— Lowest price of the year
title.zh: 「双十一」全年最低价特惠活动

message.default:
In 2017, Pure Writer launched its first version on Google Play, starting a long "five-year project". During these 5 years, we submitted a total of 8,500 updates, ranging from v1.0 to v21.0.5, in the latest version, we have implemented important functions such as Cloud Sync & Smooth Unlimited Words.

Therefore, during 2022.10.30 ~ 2022.11.12, the Double Eleven Shopping Festival, Pure Writer Pro (lifetime), originally priced at $21.99, is discounted to $13.99 — Lowest price of the year.

BTW, the latest v21.0.3 is already available on Google Play, please update it and you will smile :)
message.zh:
在11月12日之前的「双十一」购物节期间，纯纯写作 Pro（永久会员）现提供短期大幅降价优惠，全年最低价！

在纯纯写作 Pro 页面底部可查看最新优惠售价。

顺便通知：若您还在使用纯纯写作 v21.0.1 之前版本，请务必更新到 v21.0.1 或新版，此前的版本会导致纯纯写作误报「⚠️ 网络被拦截」问题，将无法登录纯纯写作账号，更新后可解，抱歉！

更新: https://t.me/PureWriter
